name: Willow Woods Eau De Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:Pine, Fire Balsam, Willow.Fragrance Description:Willow Woods is a fragrance that reminds you how to thrive. Rejuvenating pine notes and whimsical willow flow into one another for unmatched serenity. Lush, cool, and refreshingly woodsy, it’s a true outdoor scent that brings the calming effect of nature with you wherever you are..About the Bottle:The SKYLAR bottle was created to mimic a cloud's organic shape in the sky. Intended to represent the beauty of imperfection and celebration of each person's unique qualities. It’s a beautiful square design to sit comfortably in the palm of your hand and elegantly on your vanity or tabletop. All SKYLAR bottles, caps, and boxes are 100 percent recyclable..About the Fragrance:Founded by mom-preneur Cat Chen after her daughter's allergic reaction to her perfume, SKYLAR fragrances are hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin, cruelty-free, vegan, and inspired by the natural landscapes of Los Angeles.
ingredients: Sugar Cane Alcohol Denat., Parfum/fragrance, 2-t-Butylcyclohexyloxybutanol (amber note/safe synthetic), Acetic acid, (1-oxopropoxy)-, 1-(3,3-dimethylcyclohexyl)ethyl ester (musk note/safe synthetic), Dihydro pentamethylindanone (amber note/safe synthetic), Dipropylene glycol (solvent/safe synthetic), Ethylene brassylate (musk note/safe synthetic), Heliotropine (balsamic note/safe synthetic), Methyl atrarate(woody note/safe synthetic), Methyldihydrojasmonate (floral note/safe synthetic), Naphtho[2,1-b]furan, dodecahydro-3a,6,6,9a-tetramethyl-, (3aR,5aS,9aS,9bR)-(amber note/safe synthetic), Oxacyclohexadec-12-en-2-one, (12E)- (musk note/safe synthetic), Pentadecalactone (musk note/safe synthetic), Tetramethyl acetyloctahydronaphthalenes (woody note/safe synthetic), Triethyl solvent/botanical), aqua/water/eau.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply your fragrance to major pulse points such as your wrists, neck, and below the ears.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand the negative reviews for this scent. I’ve never smelled anything like it, in a good way. It’s calming, has decent staying power, and has a unique unisex woodsy/outdoorsy scent that I find intoxicating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It has a weird acid scent which gives me headache . Too strong smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand, but for me this one isn’t it. This smells like hamster bedding when dried down...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is definitely a different formula than other old skylar perfumes. I put on way too much and was surprised cause I used to have to be able to do that with old perfumes but it's really strong now. You can for sure smell it all day and I couldn't even rub it off. That being said... I don't LOVE the scent. It doesn't warm up really on the skin and I would only wear this for special occasions as it is very cologne like. I like it for that purpose but it is not a perfume I would reach for as it's not very feminine. I really wish perfumes that had tree/earth notes didn't all smell like cologne, is there not a way to make it feminine?
